revised_title: Conductivity of Lattices of Spheres: Body Centred and Face Centred Cubic Lattices
tldr: The authors calculate the effective electrical conductivity of identical spheres embedded in a matrix and arranged in body-centred and face-centred cubic lattices. They use a method originally devised by Lord Rayleigh and present experimental results for the body-centred cubic lattice of perfectly conducting spheres, confirming the theory. The study also discusses the problem of disordered arrays of spheres.
